name: Jaime L. Garcia
text: Wisdom of Solomon please. It reduces the cost of happiness to nearly free without giving you security paranoia, envy issues. It doesn't passively give you responsibility,  and doesn't create enough identity / cultural difference to cause distance between yourself and friends or kin. (Classic wealth and power problems)
